facts.text: I have a fake eye near my tail! The dark spot tricks predators into attacking the wrong end, so I can escape.
A black stripe hides my real eye! This makes it hard for predators to know which way I'm looking.
I mate for life! Butterflyfish couples stay together and swim side by side around the reef.
My long snout is perfect for reaching into coral! I can pick out tiny food that other fish can't reach.
I help scientists check if reefs are healthy! When there are lots of us around, it means the coral is doing well.

profile.habitat: Coral reefs in the Caribbean and Atlantic
profile.diet: Coral polyps, worms, and small invertebrates
